name: Winter Girls 2048
description:
Winter has come ... But there is no reason to be sad. Dive into the digital matrix 2048 and enjoy the hot beauties! Let's see how strong you are in strategic puzzles. The goal of the game is to reach the number 2048 by combining adjacent tiles with the same numbers on a 4x4 square field. If you manage, you will gain cool gifts! The better your progress in the game, the more girls will undress for you!

Winter Girls 2048 is a classic game in a stunning Christmas style! Hot prizes are waiting for you this winter!

Features:
  • Christmas strategy puzzle;
  • Simple and difficult missions for which you get hot prizes;
  • Santa Ladies who will generously reward you with their beauty;
  • Rush mode: collect as many points as possible in a limited time!
  • Excellent special effects.
